GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.18.6
GSD.description:
cfi: Fix __cfi_slowpath_diag RCU usage with cpuidle

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit ca3897f2ac02ceae5e6fa794f83c36f9885b93da, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit cf68fffb66d60d96209446bfc4a15291dc5a5d41. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: cfi: Fix __cfi_slowpath_diag RCU usage with cpuidle
